entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
